titles.title: To designate the week of June 7, 1993, through June 14, 1993, as "National Flag Celebration Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Declares the week beginning June 7, 1993, as National Flag Celebration Week, which culminates with the observance of Flag Day on June 14, 1993.
